Name: Lagrein Riserva Porphyr
Wine Description: This Lagrein selection is a multifaceted wine. It reveals aromas reminiscent of morello cherry and bilberry, with notes of licorice, coffee beans, vanilla, clove and black tea, which makes it spicy and fruity at the same time

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: The resulting wine is reflective of the cooler climate sites. The fruits are focused on black cherry and nearly ripe black plum (sweet, but crisp and not flabby).

Name: Sonoma County Merlot
Wine Description: It is Merlot releases aromatics of chocolate covered espresso bean, black cherry, caramel and licorice. The structure of this wine is sturdy with firm tannins and bright acidity, a characteristic which will carry this wine throughout a lengthy bottle life,

Name: Amarone della Valpolicella Classico
Wine Description: Full ruby red color verging on garnet red after the ageing process.Has a strong and persistent scent of ripe red fruit, plum, cherry, marasca and almond.Full-bodied, intense and elegant, it clearly reminds us of our olfactory sensations, exalting the essences of vanilla, coffee and chocolate.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Classic, three-chord composition provides structure with notes of cedar, clove and sweet tobacco for added melody. Finely polished with chocolaty tannins.

Name: Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: Intense garnet red. The nose opens on notes of black cherry and fruit in alcohol complemented by Mediterranean vegetation, and spices. The taste is fresh, balanced and deep, opening gradually decided on fruity and elegant. The finish is very persistent.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Pretty red in color. Beautiful floral notes with hints of fig and sun-ripened blackberries, followed by an array of other dark berry fruits. Bright acid and pretty oak take this home on the delicate finish.

Name: Backbone Syrah
Wine Description: Curtains of dark velvet evoke heady fruit-driven aromatics of black cherry cola, wild blueberry, sweet spearmint and clove tobacco. Chewy tannin and savory spice blanket the palate, creating a focused foundation laced with fresh fig, boysenberry reduction, dusty violet and hints of Earl Gray tea. The deep finish echos graphite minerality accompanied by persistent flavors of stewed blackberry, mocha and toasted hazelnut crunch.

Name: Jouissance Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Lightly spiced and fruity aromas of strawberry and bright cherry mix with hazelnut and fresh herbs as an introduction to this hedonistic blend of fresh fruit and earthy spice.

Name: ÜBER Syrah
Wine Description: Dense purple-violet and deep black velvet. Dark spices complimented with wafts of cola, blackberry, blueberry, and rose pedal. Secondary notes of rosemary, peppercorn, and thyme come to the fore. Subtle brioche toast in the background complement the spicy savage wild fruit.Refined but young with fine stone tannins. rounded, lively, and dense. Flavors of dense red fruit, dark chocolate with high notes of raspberry and sarsaparilla. Undertones of fresh leather, green olive pit, combines in an intricate weave of savory and spice.

Name: Bear Point Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: This Cabernet block is situated between 1,000 and 1,200 feet in a cooler spot below the fogline, hence the bandwidth of avors leans to electric blue/red fruits—which is unique from the mountain. Floral, dried blueberry and orange peel notes lift out of the glass along with red currant and pomegranate. The texture is seamless and elegant, with ne-grained tannins.

Name: Unico Gran Reserva Cabernet - Merlot
Wine Description: Color: deep violet red with orange flashes. Aroma: black fruit with notes of toast and spices. Taste: Expressive, tannic, meaty and long. Texture: Silky.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Aromas of dark cherry, raspberry and tart plum carry through to the palate. A wine with pristine flavors, balance and definition.

Name: Estate Zinfandel
Wine Description: Layered with flavors of raspberry jam, espresso, and supple tannins. Nicely balanced and mouth wateringly juicy.

Name: Tenuta Guado al Tasso Cont'Ugo Bolgheri
Chianti Classico Riserva
Wine Description: An intense ruby colour, with garnet reflections, brillant and clear. The nose is intense, with scent of cherry and red fruit. Innovative and balanced with strong aromas and sweet tannins that leave a long and persistant end.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Displays an enticing range of dark cherry, cassis, coffee, savory herb and tobacco aromas. The palate is seductive - rich, dense and concentrated revealing flavors of berry and cassis layered with notes of baking cocoa and hints of black olive. Dense, textured and layered.

Name: Pelagrilli Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: Intense ruby red aroma of dark berry fruits, new leather, cedar cigar box taste black cherry, dark plums, and earthy notes with fine tannins.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Opaque, dark ruby color. With spicy sweet oak complexity, the wine exudes dark fruit such as blackberry, black currant, blueberry and dark cherry. There are nuances of dark chocolate, chocolate berry truffle dusted with cocoa powder, cola, aromatic cedar, cinnamon, clove, graham crackers and a hint of tobacco. The body is very full with a soft entry, rich and opulent.

Name: Cumberland Reserve Pinot Noir
Wine Description: The color is deep ruby red with pale reflections of pink at the rim of the glass. On the nose you will find bright and youthful aromas of bright red cherry, red currant, chocolate and sweet spices such as clove, cinnamon and vanilla. These aromas echo in the generous mouthfeel with bright red berry and high-toned sweet spices finishing with good acid and fine tannins and a healthy amount of ripeness, characteristic of this warm vintage.

Name: Margaux
Wine Description: Produced from soils made up of a deep layer of gravel, the wines of Siran are typical of the great Margaux growths. Both powerful and delicate, they express the perfect balance between tannin, fruit and acidity. They are long-ageing wines, which over time develop sweetness on the palate, giving a characteristic silky and velvety mouth-feel.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Deep cherry, plum and blackberry flavors pulse through this wine. Super rich and layered, with a high decadent quality, this is a wine that you will want to share with friends.

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: The location of our Oak Knoll vineyard helps to bring darker fruit aromatics to the nose giving this wine a full, robust, and concentrated palate, while the region's mild climate gives this wine an elegance and a wonderful natural acidity that lifts this wine from start to finish.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Bright red cranberry, raspberry, boysenberry, dark plum and earth aromas, married with vanilla spice, toast, warm caramel and coffee aromas. The palate expands with concentrated, dark red fruit, black cherry, boysenberry and plum. On the finish, the palate gives way to warm toasted flavors complemented by toffee and coffee notes.

Name: Shea Vineyard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Earthy, organic aromas greet you as a hallmark of this wine. The rich, tilled earth is peppered with light toasty notes, dried floral perfumes, clover, rose petal and geranium flower.

Name: Le Meix Fringuet
Wine Description: Luscious red fruit flavour, wild & spicy.

Name: Finca El Otero
Wine Description: Deep, dark-cherry red with an intense pink rim. Very powerful aromas, with notes of ripe dark fruit leading the way to balsamic and spicy notes underscored by light toasty toffee and mocha hints. Tasty and powerful in the mouth, with notable structure, good balance between acidity and alcohol, and marked yet round, polished tannins that give it a great mouthfeel. Its long, harmonious finish is marked by minerality and pleasant notes of spices and black liquorice.

Name: Pinot Noir De Villiers Vineyard
Wine Description: Lush beautiful aromas of boysenberry, cedar, violets, tobacco and graphite lure you into a fascinating display of brooding flavors. Savory smoked duck, shiitakes, orange peel and gingerbread give tension to accents of forest floor, plum, blackberry and flint with a savory, mouthwatering texture. This wine is tart, full, deep, fleshy; full of wonder and pleasure.

Name: Boca
Wine Description: Its flavour reminds one of well-matured forest fruits, violets, tobacco and dried herbs with hints of balsam and citrus fruits. Power and a silky elegance will develop in the mouth, fascinating and playful, with a slightly noble and bitter final note. The vast complexity of taste allows one to discover new facets over and over again

Name: Saint-Estèphe
Wine Description: Shows notes of leather and musk after a period of time. It is full-bodied, well-rounded and structured. After ageing, the wine displays the remarkable charm of the best Saint-Estèphe: complexity, balance and harmony.

Name: Aglianico Castel del Monte
Wine Description: Colour: Dark ruby red Aroma: continuous and complex in its succession of sensations – spice, mint, toasted oak, quinine and ink, jam, dried plums, and cherries under spirits. Flavour: a wine of imposing structure, great balance, suppleness, elegance, and length.

Name: Blonde du Seigneur Côte-Rôtie
Wine Description: Intent, but the elegance which Christine seeks in all of her wines is far from absent. Pit-cherry, spice and licorice on the nose is followed by generous floral palate, with crushed rock and pepper adding character and fine linear tannins buttressing the long finish.

Name: Margaux
Wine Description: A nice wine with a beautiful freshness and a fine touch.

Name: Les Cailloux Châteauneuf-du-Pape
Wine Description: A great taste of red fruits, leather and undergrowth. The tannins are harmonious and elegant. Long finish in the mouth allowing for even more complex aromas of undergrowth, leather. The wine allies strength and elegance, complexity of secondary aromas while keeping a fruity freshness.

Name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé)
Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: This is a bold, rich Cabernet Sauvignon with a beautiful core of dark, brambly fruit -- black cherry, black raspberry and boysenberry -- framed by spicy notes of black pepper, anise, clove, cinnamon stick and fresh sage. Lush and full-bodied, the wine shows off sweet oak notes and a vanillin-tinged finish that is smooth and silky.

Name: Flanerie Vineyard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Intense, dark, deep, brooding nose with complex aromas of black cherry, roasted plum, black licorice, garrigue, pencil shavings, and black pepper. The palate envelops with sweet earthy tones, black cherry, and baking spice. Tightly wound, fine, gripping tannin and structured acidity give way to a long, complex finish.

Name: Campo dei Gigli Amarone della Valpolicella
Wine Description: Colour: impenetrable ruby red with purplee glints.Aroma: wild berries, hints of wood and minerals on fragrances of liquorice, black pepper, tobacco, spices and chocolate.Flavour: well-balanced, very intense, persistent and full-bodied and robust; to be consumed more than 5 years after harvest.

Name: Buena Tierra Vineyard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: It is aromatic and seductive with aromas of ripe raspberry and cherry cola coupled with glove leather and cinnamon. It is more expressive with a slight aeration or by decanting, but either way will yield a wine that is excellent for almost any occasion. It embodies the true Pinot character with flavors of dried cherries, strawberry malt and fresh ground allspice. There is an amazing texture to the wine that is balanced, congruent and lingering.

Name: Mink Vineyard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Fruit notes of blueberry, cherry, and raspberry dance upon a nose of cola and sassafras. The palate reveals mouthwatering minerality rounded with plum, dried apricots and blood orange, spiced with hints of tobacco. As always, the finish is dominated with the fine, chalky and mineral tannins coating the entire palate and lingering long into the finish.

Name: Brunello di Montalcino Poggio Al Granchio
Wine Description: Bright ruby red with purplish reflections. An explosion of fresh fruit reminiscent of brandied cherries, currants, blackberries and myrtle berries. Soft, silky tannins with a lingering mineral finish.

Name: Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: It is deep ruby tending to garnet with age. Full bouquet of goudron, tobacco, violet, vanilla to the nose. Dry and smooth on the palate, full and balanced, full bodied and rich.
